name: Vouchers for expenditures
text: §183-35  Vouchers for expenditures.  Such moneys herein as may be appropriated shall be expended upon warrants drawn by the comptroller of the State upon vouchers signed by the department of land and natural resources. [L 1949, c 274, §7; RL 1955, §19-26; am L 1957, c 152, §1; am L 1959, c 263, §4(b); am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §22; am L 1961, c 132, §1; HRS §183-35]
